    Wedgewood Plumbing 
    & Heating

    Building a trade business and generating leads can be difficult as a solo contractor. We developed a full branding, website and Facebook marketing solution from the ground up for Wedgewood Plumbing & Heating to drive leads and create a solid foundation for the future of their business.

    Services Provided

    Branding • Web Design • Marketing

    Visit Site

    Facebook Marketing

    With an average cost-per-click of just 17p and a massive 11x return on every penny of advertising budget, we drove thousands of leads to custom landing pages on the Wedgewood site and converted dozens of phone enquiries in the first month. We continue to manage and grow Wedgewood’s business on a monthly basis, dynamically tweaking the advertising model and building a strong customer base for repeat business.
